for_sales.sales_text: Equipment and other kit includes. SAIL & RIG * 2X sheet winch * Conyer Mainsail with slab reefing * No 1 Jib * No.2 Jib * Staysail and Topsail MECHANICAL * Yanmar GM10 Inboard * Batteries NAVIGATION * Compass * Echo Sounder * DSC Radio * GPS * AIS * Radar Reflector * Navigation Lights SAFETY * Lifebuoy * Bilge Pump OTHER * Jabsco Heads * Taylors Cooker * "The Faversham" stove DECK EQUIPMENT * Fitted Winter Cover * CQR Anchor * Fisherman's Kedge Anchor * Fenders, Warps and Boat Hook. More photos and details can be found on boatshed.com.

boat.full_description: Henrietta is a copy of the smack yacht 'Secret' (built 1932) and which is still sailing.John Tyrell took a mould from the hull and built a small number of yachts in his yard in Kent. 'Henrietta' is number 8.
boat.name: Henrietta
boat.short_description: Built by John Tyrell from a mould taken from the 1932 Smack Yacht Secret. 'Henrietta' is number 8
